name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"e2c5eaf0-9ddc-4cdb-b03b-d5cb46fe0034","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: mergeIfElse","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2c3b8acc-fcf0-4c19-aba3-466312ca8485","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"mergeIfElse","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is the core reconciliation engine for conditional control flow. Its purpose is to take the divergent analysis results from an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block and an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"else","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block and combine them into a single, unified set of possible states. It examines the variable modifications (changes) and new definitions created in each branch, performing a set union to ensure that the analyzer accounts for all possible outcomes of the conditional logic.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7ebf2d16-ef77-403c-8faa-3e3659743818","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Static analysis must be sound; it cannot simply guess which path a program will take at runtime. If an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block sets ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"status = 1","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"else","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block sets ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"status = "offline"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the only correct way to describe ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"status","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" after the block is to say it is "either 1 or 'offline'." ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"mergeIfElse","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" performs this "Join" operation, preventing the analyzer from losing information or incorrectly assuming a variable only has one of the potential values.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"63c197bc-0647-4d08-bf6c-c6d89e77c748","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a0f74240-1c1c-40e7-8d6a-dc0b81f61495","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Change Retrieval:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It fetches the list of variable modifications recorded in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"change_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for both the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ifFullNs","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"elseFullNs","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" namespaces.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5d4d366c-95e8-4cf2-b567-abd57cf42d89","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Modification Merging:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"8d730eb5-a3ee-4bc9-a812-f52394714258","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Shared Changes:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If a variable (e.g., a global ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"config","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") was modified in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"both","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" branches, it performs a bitwise OR (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"|","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") on their value sets, merging the potential results.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0bbb18bf-7b05-4e35-82af-aa4eb5cd707f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Single-Branch Changes:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If a variable was only changed in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or only in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"else","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it preserves that change but marks it as conditional.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"402a8fdc-98c7-4b2c-b900-069b6b4eea4c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Merging (New Definitions):","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"489fba94-50a4-436b-8e4f-fadb14195029","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It looks at variables newly created ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"inside","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" the branches.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7cb20405-e257-4e4f-bed1-7f93916544ca","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user_id","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" was created in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block and also in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"else","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block, it merges those two local definitions into one for the parent scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9d3be4b9-63a1-4f49-8933-6983bb065b43","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If it was only created in one branch, it carries that definition forward into the parent scope, acknowledging that the variable might exist or be undefined depending on the path.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"d0ac76be-e138-45b6-82a0-c6ac75fba18c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Result Compilation:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It returns a dictionary of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" objects that the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"update","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function then applies to the parent scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fac4529b-3d12-45f2-b031-a9fab69626af","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Consider this code:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9195ab39-bdfc-4656-84cb-9fa440cccaa9","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"if flag:
    msg = "Success"
    code = 200
else:
    msg = "Error"
    # 'code' is not mentioned here","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ea1cfbe6-c1a0-4a7b-97e1-266af9c6edd1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Analysis at the end of the block:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"066b7bb0-f193-4ce5-9fc4-d44161bbdcfb","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"mergeIfElse","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" sees ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"msg","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" was changed in both. It merges ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"{"Success", "Error"}","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"97bfa2b9-cf8a-4b04-9f26-54c1c4008cda","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It sees ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"code","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" was only changed in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block. It records ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"code","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as potentially being ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"200","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1aadb7c1-45a6-4c74-a0fd-0ee73634570d","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It returns a map: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"{"msg": ["Success", "Error"], "code": [200]}","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d2606020-d118-4a6f-b30f-b7ba3d16ab47","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Subsequent analysis correctly understands that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"msg","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is always a string, but ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"code","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" might be ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"200","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or might not have been initialized yet.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a7b27f52-bbaf-4ea3-9cad-6a26e655f850","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
